aalenna_letsOrderPizza: How about we order some pizza as a treat?
tentaluchus_pizzaSong: #{wave:3,9,0.1} When you're feelin' down an' you need anaesthesia, just give us a call - we're Triominoes Pizza!  Triple-five forty-five forty-five!  Calls only $10 per minute.  Terms and conditions may apply. 
aalenna_youShouldHide: You should hide before they get here.
aalenna_dontFret: But don't fret. One day soon the world will be ours.
aalenna_allThePizza: #{shake:2,2}And then you can eat all the delivery people you want!
